decision_conditions: work in accordance with British Standard
description: T86 - Platanus x hispanica (London Plane): remove one Massaria-infected limb, at approximately 8m to north east in canopy.T96 - Platanus x hispanica (London Plane): remove two Massaria-infected limbs, at approximately 13m north and 6m west in canopy.T101 - Platanus x hispanica (London Plane): remove one Massaria-infected limb, at approximately 13m to north in canopy.T107 - Platanus x hispanica (London Plane): remove two Massaria-infected limbs,at approximately 7m east and 11m north in canopy.T108 - Platanus x hispanica (London Plane): remove one Massaria-infected limb, with a cavity at attachment, at approximately 12 m north east orientation in canopy.Works as identified in April 2025 Climbing Inspection reports.
application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
